meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Heller Nicole Raymond Rich Rosenlof Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4109.

td.p: Matt Heller, a high school teacher from Chicago, Illinois
Nicole Raymond, a defense contractor from Alexandria, Virginia
Rich Rosenlof, a sales representative from Sacramento, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $59,800)

tr.td: THE COLD WAR YEARS
FOLLOW THE LEADER
COUNTRY COOKBOOKS
NEW TO THE INVENTORS HALL OF FAME
LAST NAME'S THE SAME
"QUE" TIPS
